statements: SELECT player_id, game_id, progress_data FROM progress;
SELECT player_id, game_id, progress_data FROM progress WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM progress;
SELECT player_id, game_id FROM progress ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, game_id, progress_data FROM progress WHERE game_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM progress WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT player_id, COUNT(game_id) FROM progress GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(game_id) > 5;
SELECT player_id, game_id, progress_data->>'level' AS current_level FROM progress WHERE progress_data->>'status' = 'active';
SELECT player_id, game_id, progress_data FROM progress ORDER BY player_id ASC, game_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT player_id FROM progress WHERE player_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000','234e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001');
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name FROM players ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players WHERE player_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM progress WHERE player_id = 2 AND game_id = 3;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(game_id) FROM progress GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(game_id) > 1;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, player_id FROM players WHERE player_id != 5 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players WHERE player_name LIKE 'J%' AND player_id > 3;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players WHERE player_name ILIKE '%a%' ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players JOIN progress ON players.player_id = progress.player_id WHERE progress.game_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, game_name, progress_percentage FROM player_progress WHERE game_name = 'Chess';
SELECT player_name, email FROM player_info ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_info WHERE release_year > 2010 ORDER BY game_name DESC;
SELECT player_id, game_name, progress_percentage FROM player_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50 ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC;
SELECT player_name, email FROM player_info WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT game_name, release_year FROM game_info ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT player_name, game_name, progress_percentage FROM player_info JOIN player_progress USING(player_id) WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT player_id, player_name, email, game_name, progress_percentage FROM player_info JOIN player_progress USING(player_id) JOIN game_info ON player_progress.game_name = game_info.game_name;

SELECT player_name, email, game_name, release_year FROM player_info JOIN player_progress USING(player_id) JOIN game_info ON player_progress.game_name = game_info.game_name ORDER BY release_year ASC, progress_percentage DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM player_progress;
SELECT player_id, game_name FROM player_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT player_id, name, email FROM player_info ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT game_name, genre FROM game_info WHERE genre = 'RPG';
SELECT player_id, game_name, play_time_minutes FROM player_game_history WHERE play_time_minutes > 120;
SELECT * FROM player_progress WHERE game_name = 'Chess';
SELECT player_id, game_name, progress_percentage FROM player_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT player_id FROM player_progress ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC;
SELECT game_name, genre FROM game_info WHERE genre = 'RPG' ORDER BY game_name ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM player_info WHERE player_id IN (SELECT player_id FROM player_game_history WHERE play_time_minutes > 100);
SELECT * FROM player_progress;
SELECT player_name, progress, last_update FROM player_progress ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT player_id, game_name, progress FROM player_progress WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT game_name, progress FROM player_progress WHERE game_name = 'Game A';
SELECT player_id, game_name, progress, last_update FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = '123' AND game_name = 'Game B';
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player LIMIT 10;
SELECT game_id, game_name, release_date FROM game WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, game_id, progress, log_time FROM progress_log WHERE progress > 50 ORDER BY log_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_id, game_name, progress FROM player_progress JOIN player ON player_progress.player_id = player.player_id WHERE player_name = 'Alice';
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_time, player.player_name FROM event_log JOIN player ON event_log.player_id = player.player_id ORDER BY event_time DESC LIMIT 3;
